strings.Value: "If we may, I would like to return once more to that forsaken fortress. To walk below its arches... to feel the tranquility of its halls and arcades... to listen to the silence..."
"Do as you wish, but you can do it without me. Dirt, ruins... Ughhh!"
"I find your notions of tranquility and silence rather strange. For me, I'm content with the calmness of my tent."
"It might do you good. Such places seem to lift the gloom from your brow..."
